sections.heading: was added to and made a
sections.text:
part of ORS chapter 238 by legislative action but was not added to any smaller

series therein. See Preface to Oregon Revised Statutes for further explanation.

sections.heading: of this 2013 special
sections.text:
session Act [238.447] and the amendments to ORS 238A.050 by section 5 of this

2013 special session Act apply only to conduct resulting in a conviction of a

felony that is committed on or after the effective date of this 2013 special

session Act [October 8, 2013]. [2013 s.s. c.3 �6]
